name: Verify Advanced Project Options section is available
description: Verify that the user can access the Advanced Project Options section by navigating to the Configure page of a multi-configuration project.
descriptionHtml: Verify that the user can access the Advanced Project Options section by navigating to the Configure page of a multi-configuration project.

beforeStages.name: Set up config from context for test session.
Clear Jenkins data before each test run.

steps.name: Clean up Jenkins data.
Delete all existing jobs and views for the user session.
Extract Jenkins crumb token from HTML response.

parameters.name: config
parameters.value: Config(browser=BrowserConfig(NAME='chrome', OPTIONS_CHROME='--remote-allow-origins=*;--disable-gpu;--no-sandbox;--disable-dev-shm-usage;--headless=new;--window-size=1920,1080', OPTIONS_EDGE='--window-size=1920,1080'), jenkins=JenkinsConfig(HOST='localhost', PORT='8080', USERNAME='admin', PASSWORD='e322e7761c10457ebc1f72a3431a133a', base_url='http://localhost:8080', login_url='http://localhost:8080/j_spring_security_check', login_data={'j_username': 'admin', 'j_password': 'e322e7761c10457ebc1f72a3431a133a'}, crumb='39b00910637554de5ecfd63524525d8baae59f13320385f99893446466b3c8d1', current_username=''))

testStage.description: Verify that the user can access the Advanced Project Options section by navigating to the Configure page of a multi-configuration project.

steps.name: Get Advanced Project Options section
Wait for the element to be visible
Scroll to element
Assert Advanced Project Options section is displayed
